page.title: 13BRAUNSTONE PARK
page.content: This public park is on the edge of the Braunstone Council Estate. It is a large open park that has a variety of facilities for the local population.These consists of: 1.A childrens playground with slides swings and other play equipment. 2.Football pitches that are used by local football teams on Saturdays and Sundays. 3.A small lake that has ducks and other wildlife on it. 4.A junior school that uses the old Braunstone Hall itself for classrooms. 5.Each year in September a large Dog show is held on the park as part of the Leicester Show. 6.Two or three times a year the Leicester Schools Cross Country association hold some races on the park.
